body:
G'day, Avicians... Avicorians...
People who play Avicus, there we go.
It is I, pokeblock300. You may know me from nowhere and from nothing, playing the occasional game of Nexus or something. Maybe even just chatting in hub whatever
Seriously now, I enjoy the Avicus community and the servers (whom I have to thank GlitchyJuan for bringing me here), so I'd like for all of you to get to know the nobody better, so you'll be able to say you know the know-buddy [( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)].
Ask away!
~pokeblock300
